text: Paratu jihare loka gi'ana vica pake ate imana li'a'una vale hana usa kitaba ute jihari tuhade upara utari ga'i hai ate jihari'am tuhade tom pahilam vi utari'am ga'i'am hana. Uha namaza parhana vale hana ate zakata dena vale hana. Alaha upara ate ki'amata de dina upara bharosa rakhana vale hana. Ajihe lokam nu asim zarura bahuta vada inama devange
